ticket.title: Lane CORRUPT persistence + refusal semantics: marker file, reasons, and operator workflow

in_scope: Define `lanes/<lane_id>/corrupt.v1.json` marker schema (reason, receipt digest, detected_at).

Worker refuses to lease a CORRUPT lane and emits a structured reset recommendation (apm2.fac.lane_reset_recommendation.v1 JSON to stderr). When FESv1 queue-based control jobs land (RFC-0019), the recommendation can be enqueued directly.
CLI: `apm2 fac lane mark-corrupt <lane_id> --reason ...` (optional) for operators.

criteria: CORRUPT lanes are never used inadvertently.
